title: Ben Shapiru sells sheets
author: VD
content_html:
The littlest chickenhawk sells sheets to his fellow neoclowns. I’m not kidding, that’s literally what he’s doing. Promo code: CLEANSE PALESTINE. Hilarious.

“I can’t speak highly enough of these sheets. They’re really fantastic!”
– Grand Wizard Ben Shapiru
